input.sentences: macro photography is fun | so we started with mushrooms .
then tried a closeup on bark .
of course | we had to take photographs of flowers .
and also things that look indescribably strange up close .
output.sentences: My photography trip began with some pictures of mushrooms.
Then I took some neat close ups of tree bark.
I also took plenty of pictures of flowers.
The insects were in full glory.
I got up and close with some indescribably strange things as well.
